alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 10 at 10:31AM EST until December 10 at 11:15AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Wakulla County in Big Bend Florida... Southwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend Florida... Northeastern Franklin County in Big Bend Florida... * Until 1115 AM EST. * At 1030 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles southwest of Crawfordville to 14 miles east of Carrabelle, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Woodville, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Sopchoppy, Newport, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Bald Point, Hyde Park, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Mcintyre, Tully, Plum Orchard, Panacea, Shell Point, Port Leon, Medart, Wakulla Beach, and Buckhorn. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for Big Bend Florida.
